It seems strange to think, but b/c Sydney's summer has been so hot, 25 degrees feels like a cool day. A welcome change at least.
@SGUYBRAY Thanks! Will do.
@SGUYBRAY Yes they're the 2 I'm preferring at this point. Might come down to what fits best w/ my kids' school hours & day care. Can't wait!

@milkingahegoat The religion one? It sounds good but I can't attend the lecture and I love lectures. I'm leaning towards Knowledge & Limits.
@MichelleArrow1 Yes! And I'm almost certain I'll pick it. Just got to check I can get the right tute time.

@DonnaSBJ @Macquarie_Uni Hey Donna, they sent me an email this morning and it states Mon 27 Feb. They should fix website though!
My 2 eldest kids are back to school today. My youngest is pining for her new preschool. I'm relishing the peace & slow pace I can take today
